The claim made by Sen: Elizabeth Warren that the majority of voters supported Democratic Senate candidates over Republican ones.
The observation that the claim ignores t: thirds of states hold Senate elections in any given election, and heavily Democratic states like California and New York had Senate elections while heavily Republican Texas did not.
The mention of Sen: Warren's speech opposing the 21st Century Cures Act, where she argued that Americans gave Democrats "majority support" to combat corporate influence over government policy.
